value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I just received a report that Emblian
forces are moving on Vaskrheim
again.$k$pIt seems some more Brave Heroes
have appeared there.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Heroes born from the wishes of
mankind... We need to see for
ourselves who these Heroes are.$k$p

$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|So let me get this straight... In this
world, we're called Brave Heroes?$k$p$WmMPID_ルーテ,ch08_08_Lute_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes. According to this grimoire, we've
been summoned to this place as
special beings.$k$pI'm not surprised that someone such
as myself would be considered so
special.$k$pAfter all...there's no one better than
me!$k$p$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|More like no one stranger...$k$pWell, I don't like that we're trapped
here by these contracts. But...$k$pI guess it's not every day I get to test
my skills against powerful opponents
from a whole other world.$k$pSomething about the name Order of
Heroes has a nice ring to it, too... I
bet my true archrival is among them!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I guess that's 1-0, in your favor.
You're a crafty group! And every bit
as strong as the rumors claim.$k$pWell, as I like to say... If I lose today,
I'll train harder and win tomorrow. You
better believe there will be a rematch!$k$p$Sbs150|
